metadata.title: CVE-2019-2181 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In binder_transaction of binder.c in the Android kernel, there is apossible out of bounds write due to an integer overflow. This could lead tolocal escalation of privilege with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
